Query.Sql: select distinct -- NHS Number: unique patient identifier, will be mapped to person_id in a later ETL step Record ->> '$.LinkagePatientId.NhsNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber, -- Date of primary cancer diagnosis: maps to condition_start_date, will be cast to date type in a later step (format CCYY-MM-DD) Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.LinkageDiagnosticDetails.DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed' as DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed, -- Primary ICD diagnosis code: maps to condition_source_value, will be mapped to a standard condition_concept_id via ICD-10 vocabulary in a later step Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.LinkageDiagnosticDetails.PrimaryDiagnosisIcd.@code' as PrimaryDiagnosisIcd from omop_staging.cosd_staging_901 where type = 'HA' and NhsNumber is not null and DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed is not null and PrimaryDiagnosisIcd is not null;

Explanation.Description: NHS Number is the primary identifier for a person or patient in NHS England and Wales.
DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED) is the date the Primary Cancer was confirmed or the Primary Cancer diagnosis was agreed.
Explanation.Origin: DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

Explanation.Description: ICD code used to identify the primary diagnosis.
